summary: How does a man react when he loses everything he loves? MR. HUSH has an answer: with brutal, terrifying violence. A frightening throwback to the slasher films of the 1980s, this is a classic horror flick that is hard to shake.
cast: Brad Loree|Edward X. Young|Stephen Geoffreys|Steve Dash|Jessica Cameron|Connie Giordano|Thomas J. Churchill|Tim Dougherty|Alexis Lauren|Colleen Cohan|Brian O'Halloran|Megan Heckman|Mike Marino|Vanessa Romanelli|Thomas Warnock|Bridget Hogue|Bryan Andrew|Amanda Madison|Edward A. Young|Shirley Dluginski
title: Mr. Hush
